solution_line_template: The second protest was {first_protest_duration}*{longer_percent_decimal}=<<{first_protest_duration}*{longer_percent_decimal}={second_protest_longer_duration}>>{second_protest_longer_duration} day longer than the first.

So the second protest was {first_protest_duration}+{second_protest_longer_duration}=<<{first_protest_duration}+{second_protest_longer_duration}={second_protest_total_duration}>>{second_protest_total_duration} days.
